Features: We're just minutes from the Texas Medical Center, Rice Village and Rice University.
Our residents have access to a private hourly shuttle service to and from the Medical Center.
Also, easy access to Houston's downtown business center and Reliant Stadium.
Special features include amenities usually found in custom homes.
A strong European influence is evident throughout the interiors.
This is the life, so indulge yourself!

Community Amenities: Fitness center, 1 Pool, Free WiFi Areas, Gated entrance, Perimeter fence, Assigned parking, Club house, Sauna, Picnic area, Outdoor grills, Carports, Furnished units, Handicap modified units, Bus stop

Unit Amenities: W/D machines, Walk-in closets, Garden/large tubs, Private patios/balconies, Attached garages, Cable ready, Hi-speed internet, High ceilings, Custom carpet, Non-carpeted flooring, Custom built-ins, Ice makers, Premium Countertops, Premium Appliances, Self cleaning ovens
